| **[Reference](/wiki/Source_code "Source code")**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            | [SLASH'EM\_0.0.7E7F2/monst.c#line2167](/wiki/SLASH%27EM_0.0.7E7F2/monst.c#line2167 "SLASH'EM 0.0.7E7F2/monst.c") |

A **baby deep dragon**, D, is a type of [monster](/wiki/Monster "Monster") that appears in [SLASH'EM](/wiki/SLASH%27EM "SLASH'EM") and [SlashTHEM](/wiki/SlashTHEM "SlashTHEM"). It is a juvenile [deep dragon](/wiki/Deep_dragon "Deep dragon") that lacks the [poison](/wiki/Poison "Poison") and [level draining](/wiki/Level_drain "Level drain") of their adult forms, but has somewhat better [AC](/wiki/AC "AC") than other [baby dragons](/wiki/Dragon_\(SLASH%27EM\) "Dragon (SLASH'EM)"). Like all [dragons](/wiki/Dragon "Dragon"), baby deep dragons are [strong](/wiki/Strong "Strong"), [carnivorous](/wiki/Carnivorous "Carnivorous"), [thick-skinned](/wiki/Thick-skinned "Thick-skinned"), and capable of [flight](/wiki/Flight "Flight") - they will also seek out [gold](/wiki/Gold "Gold") and [gems](/wiki/Gems "Gems") to pick up among other items.

Baby deep dragons have a poisonous bite attack, and are one of three baby dragons in SLASH'EM and SlashTHEM to not [hit as an enchanted weapon](/wiki/Hits_creatures_as_%2Bx_weapon "Hits creatures as +x weapon") alongside [baby silver dragons](/wiki/Baby_silver_dragon "Baby silver dragon") and [baby shimmering dragons](/wiki/Baby_shimmering_dragon_\(SLASH%27EM\) "Baby shimmering dragon (SLASH'EM)").

## Generation

Randomly generated baby deep dragons are always hostile. A baby deep dragon can [grow up](/wiki/Grow_up "Grow up") into a deep dragon, and deep dragon [eggs](/wiki/Egg "Egg") can hatch into baby deep dragons.

In addition to random generation, baby deep dragons may also appear in [dragon lairs](/wiki/Dragon_lair "Dragon lair") and [the Wyrm Caves](/wiki/The_Wyrm_Caves "The Wyrm Caves").[\[1\]](#cite_note-1) Baby deep dragons may appear among the hostile D generated in [throne rooms](/wiki/Throne_room "Throne room"), and can also appear among the monsters randomly generated by [looting](/wiki/Looting "Looting") a [throne](/wiki/Throne "Throne") while [confused](/wiki/Confused "Confused") and carrying gold (provided there is no [chest](/wiki/Chest "Chest") on the level).[\[2\]](#cite_note-2)

## References

1. [↑](#cite_ref-1) [mkroom.c in SLASH'EM 0.0.7E7F2, line 335](/wiki/Source:SLASH%27EM_0.0.7E7F2/mkroom.c#line335 "Source:SLASH'EM 0.0.7E7F2/mkroom.c")
2. [↑](#cite_ref-2) [mkroom.c in SLASH'EM 0.0.7E7F2, line 783](/wiki/Source:SLASH%27EM_0.0.7E7F2/mkroom.c#line783 "Source:SLASH'EM 0.0.7E7F2/mkroom.c")

- *This page is a **[stub](/wiki/Category:Stubs "Category:Stubs")**. Should you wish to do so, you can contribute by [**expanding this page**.](https://nethackwiki.com/index.php?title=Baby_deep_dragon_\(SLASH%27EM\)\&action=edit)*

Baby deep dragon (SLASH'EM)

From NetHackWiki
Jump to navigation Jump to search
D baby deep dragon
Difficulty 6
Attacks Bite 2d6 poisonous
D baby deep dragon
Difficulty 6
Attacks

Bite 2d6 poisonous

Base level 4
Base experience 52
Speed 9
Base AC 0
Base MR 10
Alignment 0 (neutral)
Frequency (by normal means) 2 (Quite rare)
Genocidable Yes
Weight 500
Nutritional value 500
Size Huge
Resistances None
Resistances conveyed None

A baby deep dragon:

  • can fly.
  • has no hands.
  • has a thick hide.
  • is carnivorous.
  • is normally generated hostile.
  • is strong.
  • likes gold.
  • likes gems.
Reference SLASH'EM_0.0.7E7F2/monst.c#line2167

A baby deep dragon, D, is a type of monster that appears in SLASH'EM and SlashTHEM. It is a juvenile deep dragon that lacks the poison and level draining of their adult forms, but has somewhat better AC than other baby dragons. Like all dragons, baby deep dragons are strong, carnivorous, thick-skinned, and capable of flight - they will also seek out gold and gems to pick up among other items.

Baby deep dragons have a poisonous bite attack, and are one of three baby dragons in SLASH'EM and SlashTHEM to not hit as an enchanted weapon alongside baby silver dragons and baby shimmering dragons.

Generation

Randomly generated baby deep dragons are always hostile. A baby deep dragon can grow up into a deep dragon, and deep dragon eggs can hatch into baby deep dragons.

In addition to random generation, baby deep dragons may also appear in dragon lairs and the Wyrm Caves.[1] Baby deep dragons may appear among the hostile D generated in throne rooms, and can also appear among the monsters randomly generated by looting a throne while confused and carrying gold (provided there is no chest on the level).[2]

References

  1. ↑ mkroom.c in SLASH'EM 0.0.7E7F2, line 335
  2. ↑ mkroom.c in SLASH'EM 0.0.7E7F2, line 783
This page is a stub. Should you wish to do so, you can contribute by expanding this page.

A '''baby deep dragon''', {{monsym|baby deep dragon}}, is a type of [[monster]] that appears in [[SLASH'EM]] and [[SlashTHEM]]. It is a juvenile [[deep dragon]] that lacks the [[poison]] and [[level drain]]ing of their adult forms, but has somewhat better [[AC]] than other [[Dragon (SLASH'EM)|baby dragons]]. Like all [[dragon]]s, baby deep dragons are [[strong]], [[carnivorous]], [[thick-skinned]], and capable of [[flight]] - they will also seek out [[gold]] and [[gems]] to pick up among other items.

Baby deep dragons have a poisonous bite attack, and are one of three baby dragons in SLASH'EM and SlashTHEM to not [[Hits creatures as +x weapon|hit as an enchanted weapon]] alongside [[baby silver dragon]]s and [[Baby shimmering dragon (SLASH'EM)|baby shimmering dragons]].

==Generation==
Randomly generated baby deep dragons are always hostile. A baby deep dragon can [[grow up]] into a deep dragon, and deep dragon [[egg]]s can hatch into baby deep dragons.

In addition to random generation, baby deep dragons may also appear in [[dragon lair]]s and [[the Wyrm Caves]].{{refsrc|mkroom.c|335|version=SLASH'EM 0.0.7E7F2}} Baby deep dragons may appear among the hostile {{white|D}} generated in [[throne room]]s, and can also appear among the monsters randomly generated by [[looting]] a [[throne]] while [[confused]] and carrying gold (provided there is no [[chest]] on the level).{{refsrc|mkroom.c|783|version=SLASH'EM 0.0.7E7F2}}
